## TG-164059: Senior Learning Designer (Request for Proposal)

### Call for Proposals

The Department of National Defence requires the services of a Senior Learning Designer to conduct learning needs analysis, instructional design, and development of self-directed eLearning training content.

#### Tender Information

* **Solicitation Number**: W6369-23-X019
* **Close Date**: December 19, 2022, at 14:00 EST
* **Contracting Agency**: Department of National Defence
* **Contracting Authority**: Director of Materiel Group Management Coordination (DMGMC)
* **Location**: National Capital Region (NCR), Canada

#### Description

The Senior Learning Designer will be responsible for:

* Conducting learning needs analysis for multiple projects/courses
* Developing Instructional Design Plans, Master Lesson Plans, and self-directed eLearning Training Storyboards
* Collaborating with stakeholders to ensure compliance with project requirements and timelines
* Developing learning solutions using templates provided by the Project Authority (PA)

#### Contract Duration

The initial contract period will be for one (1) year, with three (3) one (1) year option periods.

#### Trade Agreements

* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)

#### Tender Proposal Instructions

Prospective bidders are required to submit their proposals electronically via the Buyandsell.gc.ca (BC) platform. The tender documents, including the Request for Proposal (RFP) and supporting materials, can be downloaded from the same platform. Proposal submission deadline is December 19, 2022, at 14:00 EST. No late proposals will be accepted.

**Note: The tender is NOW CLOSED**.

For more information, contact Ashley Ratnam at [ashley.ratnam@forces.gc.ca](mailto:ashley.ratnam@forces.gc.ca).
